6.description: Enable and disable the PIR sensor

13.label: Pir Sensitivity Setting
13.description: You can modify the sensitivity of PIR if changing the value in parameter 13

20.label: Basic Set, Notification And Basic Report
20.description: Changing parameter 20 can let the multisensor send out "Basic Set" command or "basic report" command or "notification" report to Z-Wave devices

28.label: Enable And Disable The LED Indication When PIR Triggered And After Timeout
28.description: Enable & disable the LED indication when PIR is triggered and after timeout

metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified
controller to add the device in the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your
motion sensor, press and release the button
on the sensor to add it in the network.
3. The blue LED will activate for 3 seconds to
confirm it has been included in the network
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller
to remove the device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your
motion sensor, press and release the button on
the sensor to exclude it from the network.
3. The LED will blink for 3 seconds at a time.

NOTE: If the sensorâ€™s power source is changed
after initial setup (ex: USB power instead of
battery power), the sensor must be excluded
from the network and then re-included
metadata.reset:
1. Press the button 10 times within 6 seconds
(interval between 2 presses of the button
cannot be longer than 1 second).
2. The blue LED will blink for 3 seconds
